Body:
data = np.genfromtxt(os.path.join(BASE_DIR, 'test_data', 'test3d_data.txt'),
    skip_header=1)
ans = np.genfromtxt(os.path.join(BASE_DIR, './test_data/test3d_answer.txt'))
ans_z = ans[:, (0)].reshape((10, 10, 10))
ans_ss = ans[:, (1)].reshape((10, 10, 10))
k3d = OrdinaryKriging3D(data[:, (0)], data[:, (1)], data[:, (2)], data[:, (
    3)], variogram_model='linear', variogram_parameters=[1.0, 0.1])
k, ss = k3d.execute('grid', np.arange(10.0), np.arange(10.0), np.arange(
    10.0), backend='loop', n_closest_points=10)
assert_allclose(k, ans_z, rtol=0.001)
assert_allclose(ss, ans_ss, rtol=0.001)
